item.title: Manchester United Teams Up With Coca-Cola In New 3-Year Deal
item.description: The football club has named Coca-Cola its official carbonated drinks partner in the U.K. and Europe.

item.title: Home Depot, Lowe’s Q2 Earnings In Focus As Investors And Wall Street Watch For Recovery In Large-Scale Renovation Demand
item.description: Telsey Advisory Group maintained its price target of $455 on Home Depot and $305 on Lowe’s.
